title: China grants $ 45.6 m in emergency assistance
body_lines: To support Sri Lankan people at this trying time, China is extending a further 300 million RMB ($ 45.6 million).
The Chinese Embassy in a twitter message said that 300 million RMB will be in aid securing urgently needed drugs, food and fuel etc.
It said with the latest move increases total emergency grant from China to 500 million RMB (around $ 76 million).
